values.card1Text: Exploring cutting-edge AI/ML architectures like YOLO and implementing native solutions for performance.

projects.heroSubtitle: Explore my work in AI, Systems, and Web Development.
projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.subtitle: Showcase of my technical capabilities and engineering projects.

swifdock.shortDescription: Native macOS container runtime using Swift, providing lightweight containerization without Docker Desktop dependency.
swifdock.challenge: Building a container runtime from scratch on macOS without relying on heavy external dependencies like Docker Desktop.
swifdock.approach: Implemented container lifecycle management with native macOS process isolation and designed a SwiftUI interface for monitoring.
swifdock.result: A lightweight, secure container solution integrated with macOS security frameworks.

jwksServer.shortDescription: Python-based JWKS server implementing industry-standard JWT authentication and cryptographic key rotation.
jwksServer.challenge: Creating a secure authentication service with robust encryption and key management.
jwksServer.approach: Used FastAPI for RESTful endpoints, AES-256-CBC for encryption, and Argon2 for password hashing.
jwksServer.result: High test coverage (97%), secure key storage, and efficient rate limiting.

polymorphicCodeVault.shortDescription: Comprehensive collection of OOP projects demonstrating mastery of Java and C++ concepts.
polymorphicCodeVault.challenge: Demonstrating advanced OOP principles through diverse and complex implementations.
polymorphicCodeVault.approach: Built various systems including an Enigma machine simulation and an ANSI terminal color system using design patterns.
polymorphicCodeVault.result: 10+ projects with 10k+ lines of code, showcasing encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.
